casebody.data:
AZALEA GARDEN BOARD & CARE, INC.
v.
Faiger M. BLACKWELL and Blackwell & Associates Management, Inc. No. 219P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 19, 2006. Joe Biesecker, Lexington, for Azalea Garden Board & Care, Inc. Amiel Rossabi, Emily J. Meister, Greensboro, for Blackwell.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th day of April 2006 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th day of July 2006."
